trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_130<tab>Pshhh... Why do you tressspass on our land, shhhorewalker? You are not welcome here.
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_000<tab>Pshhh... What do you want of me, finless one?
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_A1_000_001<tab>Who are you?
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_A1_000_002<tab>What kind of place is this?
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_010<tab>Every ssspawnling who lives here in the nursssery is the ssson of Clutchfather Novv.
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_011<tab>I am Qull, fifth eldest of our clutch.
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_012<tab>For the Sssahagin, clutch and kin take precedence over all. We are bound by blood, and not even the ssstrongest current can break sssuch ties.
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_020<tab>This is a Sssahagin nursssery─the home of our clutch.
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_021<tab>Here we learn the ways of our people, and grow under the watchful eye of Clutchfather Novv.
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_022<tab>Mossst Sssahagin inhabit a great city deep beneath the waves, but we ssspawnlings mussst remain ashore until our fins reach their full sssize.

TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_023<tab>Pshhh... Until that day, my clutchmatesss and I will reside in the nursssery. We protect thisss land from intruders to enshhhure that future generations have a sssafe place to ssspawn.
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_100<tab>Pshhh... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The clutch welcomes your return. ...Have you brought more oh-ren-jez?
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_A2_000_001<tab>How fares the nursery?
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_A2_000_002<tab>What kind of place is this?
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_A2_000_003<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_110<tab>Pshhh... The Coral Tridentsss no longer provoke the shhhorewalkers as they once did, but the younger warriors are ressstless and prideful. As always, sssmall ssskirmishes erupt on our borders...

TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_111<tab>But the desire to sssecure the future of our race is shhhared by all. Under the guidance of Clutchfather Novv, the bridge towards peace begins to take shhhape─a bridge that we could never have built without your aid.
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_112<tab>Pshhh... Sssahagin value blood ties over all, and my ssspawnbrothers and I are no different.

TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_113<tab>But though you have no fins and ssswim ssslower than a three-day-old hatchling, we are proud to call you “clutchmate.” The nursssery is always open to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_120<tab>This is a Sssahagin nursssery─the home of our clutch.
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_121<tab>Here we learn the ways of our people, and grow under the watchful eye of Clutchfather Novv.
TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_122<tab>Mossst Sssahagin inhabit a great city deep beneath the waves, but we ssspawnlings mussst remain ashore until our fins reach their full sssize.

TEXT_REGSEANOVVTRAININGGROUND_00155_QULL_000_123<tab>Pshhh... Until that day, my clutchmatesss and I will reside in the nursssery. We protect thisss land from intruders to enshhhure that future generations have a sssafe place to ssspawn.
